ygData.subject: need spoiler info on Qeynos quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail. I am stuck on the Knights of Thunder donation quest. My mission is to find 6 citizens that will give donations to the Temple of Thunder. Then along with
ygData.messageBody:
Hail. I am stuck on the Knights of Thunder donation quest. My mission is to
find 6 citizens that will give donations to the Temple of Thunder. Then
along with my pk note, i combine and give to the person who gave me the
quest. Well, I have found 2 citizens and have a lead on a 3rd but i cannot
find anyone else to donate. If anyone has completed this quest, could you
please mail me some info. I have found 2 citizens in Qeynos and maybe a 3rd
real close to Qeynos.

Thanks in advance,
Abrell of Cazic
